<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataST extends data { const CODE = 'ST'; const PREFIX = 239; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:22|9\d)\d{5}', ); const TYPES = array( '22\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '900[5-9]\d{3}|9(?:0[1-9]|[89]\d)\d{4}'=>array( 'mobile', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', ); }
